Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two students, suggesting an attempt to show communication partners.
The student might include a disconnected line or shape that could be an attempt at representing a string.
CANNOT: The student likely does not illustrate the string correctly connecting two clear devices like cups or cans (student doesn't fully grasp the concept of a string telephone).
The student might not understand or show the function of the string in sound communication (lack of understanding of sound transmission).
The student may not include any labels or notes indicating an understanding of communication or sound transmission (student doesn't know the principles involved).
Key components such as the cups/cans as parts of the device are probably missing or incorrectly depicted (student doesn't recognize necessary elements).
